programName: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems

heroSection.heading: Bachelor of Science in Information Systems
heroSection.subheading: Choose BSIS as ur course lol it's fun trust me :)

aboutSection.heading: This is where imma put the about section heading
aboutSection.subheading: This is an about section subheading where you tell your site visitors something about your college. Maybe vision or mission it's up to you.

careerSection.title: Business Systems Analyst
careerSection.description: Bridge the gap between business needs and technology solutions by analyzing processes and designing information systems.

careerSection.title: IT Business Analyst
careerSection.description: Work with stakeholders to gather requirements and translate them into system specifications for developers.

careerSection.title: Systems Designer
careerSection.description: Create detailed designs and models for information systems that meet organizational goals.

careerSection.title: Project Manager (IT/IS)
careerSection.description: Lead teams in implementing information systems projects, ensuring they are delivered on time and within scope.

careerSection.title: Data Analyst
careerSection.description: Interpret and analyze business data to provide actionable insights for decision-making.

careerSection.title: Information Systems Auditor
careerSection.description: Evaluate and monitor information systems to ensure compliance, security, and efficiency.

careerSection.title: ERP Specialist
careerSection.description: Configure and maintain Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) systems to support business processes.

careerSection.title: IT Consultant
careerSection.description: Advise businesses on the best ways to use information technology to meet their objectives.
